survey_name: University Lab Equipment Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from university students and faculty regarding their satisfaction with lab equipment availability, functionality, and overall experience in university laboratories.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the university lab equipment?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the university lab equipment?

questions.question_text: Which of the following lab equipment do you use most often? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection to allow multiple answers.

script.question_text: Which of the following lab equipment do you use most often? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of lab equipment when needed?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this single-choice question to measure satisfaction levels accurately.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of lab equipment when needed?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you face when using the lab equipment.
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very Dissatisfied' in Q3
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows respondents to provide detailed feedback on specific issues.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you face when using the lab equipment.
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very Dissatisfied' in Q3

questions.question_text: How would you rate the condition of the lab equipment you use most frequently?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button to assess the condition of equipment.

script.question_text: How would you rate the condition of the lab equipment you use most frequently?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the university lab equipment and facilities?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows for free-form suggestions and feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the university lab equipment and facilities?
